{"meta":null,"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The official pricing for OpenAI ChatGPT at chatgpt.com is:

- **Free plan**: Basic access to ChatGPT.
- **ChatGPT Plus**: $20/month. This plan includes enhanced access, faster responses, general availability even during peak times, and priority access to new features and improvements[1][5][3].
- **ChatGPT Pro**: $200/month. This tier is for power users needing advanced model access, unlimited GPT-4o usage, priority research previews (like Operator and Sora), advanced tools, and higher limits on capabilities such as video generation, screen sharing, and deep research[3][1].

For official help, support, or documentation:
- The main **OpenAI Help Center** covers all ChatGPT topics including billing, account, technical issues, and detailed feature guides[4][2].
- The dedicated section for **ChatGPT and its features** can be found at the ChatGPT collection in the Help Center[2].

These are the authoritative sources for both current pricing and support information about ChatGPT from OpenAI.

Citations:
[1] https://help.openai.com/en/articles/6950777-what-is-chatgpt-plus
[2] https://help.openai.com/en/collections/3742473-chatgpt
[3] https://www.cloudeagle.ai/blogs/blog-chatgpt-pricing-guide
[4] https://help.openai.com
[5] https://openai.com/index/chatgpt-plus/
","annotations":null,"meta":null}],"structuredContent":null,"isError":false}, {"meta":null,"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The official pricing for Anthropic Claude at claude.ai is as follows:

- **Free**: Free forever for basic use[3].
- **Pro**: $20 per month[3][5].
- **Team**: $30 per user/month if billed monthly, or $25 if billed annually (minimum 5 users)[3].
- **Enterprise**: Custom pricing; reportedly around $60 per seat with a 70-seat minimum, though not officially published[3].
- **Max**: $100/month (5x Pro rate limits) or $200/month (20x Pro rate limits), offering significantly higher usage and priority features[5].

For **API access**, Anthropic uses a pay-per-token model (2025 rates):
- **Claude Opus 4**: $15/million input tokens, $75/million output tokens[1].
- **Claude Sonnet 4**: $3/million input tokens, $15/million output tokens[1].
- **Claude Haiku 3.5**: $0.80/million input tokens, $4/million output tokens[1].

These figures represent the most current pricing available as of May 2025[1][5][3].

For **official help and documentation pages**:
- Anthropic’s primary help resource is the [Anthropic Docs Pricing page][2], which details pricing and model information.
- The public help center for Claude at claude.ai can be found through links or sections such as “Help,” “Support,” or “Docs” directly on the claude.ai website.

**Note:** Always refer to the [Anthropic pricing page][2] for the most up-to-date and official pricing and feature lists, as rates may change frequently.

**Summary Table (Pricing via claude.ai):**

| Plan       | Price per Month     | Notes                                    |
|------------|--------------------|------------------------------------------|
| Free       | $0                 | Basic use, limited features              |
| Pro        | $20                | Enhanced usage for individuals           |
| Team       | $30 ($25 annual)   | Per user/month, 5-user minimum           |
| Enterprise | Custom (~$60 est.) | Advanced, larger usage, min. 70 seats    |
| Max        | $100/$200          | Power users, highest usage limits        |

For **detailed plans, API pricing, and documentation**, refer directly to Anthropic’s official docs and help pages[2][1][3].

Citations:
[1] https://blog.laozhang.ai/ai-tools/claude-4-pricing-guide-2025/
[2] https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/about-claude/pricing
[3] https://team-gpt.com/blog/claude-pricing/
[4] https://tech.co/news/how-much-does-claude-ai-cost
[5] https://techcrunch.com/2025/04/09/anthropic-rolls-out-a-200-per-month-claude-subscription/
","annotations":null,"meta":null}],"structuredContent":null,"isError":false}, {"meta":null,"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The official pricing for xAI Grok starts at **$8 per month** for the standard X Premium subscription, with a **free tier available** featuring query limits[1]. There is also a **SuperGrok Heavy** subscription tier priced at **$300 per month**, offering higher rate limits and access to the most advanced Grok features, including Grok 4 Heavy[3][5].

You can find the official help and FAQ pages for Grok at:
- **help.x.com**: Covers Grok’s features, privacy, availability, and X integration for users on X[2].
- **x.ai/legal/faq**: Consumer FAQs for users of grok.com or the Grok mobile app, detailing Grok’s capabilities and user interaction options[4].

**Where to access Grok and support:**
- Grok is available via grok.com, X.com, and the Grok app on iOS/Android[5][2].
- For help, see the [‘About Grok’ page at help.x.com][2] and the [xAI FAQ at x.ai][4].

**Subscription tiers overview:**
| Subscription                 | Price per Month | Features                              |
|------------------------------|----------------|---------------------------------------|
| X Premium (Standard Grok)    | $8             | Full Grok access on X; some query limits |
| SuperGrok Heavy              | $300           | Grok 4 Heavy; higher limits; advanced features |
| Free Grok version            | $0             | Limited queries; basic access on X    |

For additional technical guides and API documentation, visit **grok.com** or **x.ai**[5].

**Key details from the help pages:**
- Grok is powered by xAI’s advanced language models, accessible on Grok.com and X platforms.
- Privacy: xAI does not sell your data; privacy requests can be submitted through the policy inquiry forms on the help pages[2][4].
- Availability: Grok is offered anywhere X is available, and now features real-time knowledge integration and persona customization[4].

For the official documentation and feature guides, refer to the Grok help centers:
- **https://help.x.com/en/using-x/about-grok**[2]
- **https://x.ai/legal/faq**[4]
- **https://grok.com/** (for technical/API guides as referenced on xAI’s homepage)[5]

Citations:
[1] https://tech.co/news/grok-ai-pricing
[2] https://help.x.com/en/using-x/about-grok
[3] https://techcrunch.com/2025/07/09/elon-musks-xai-launches-grok-4-alongside-a-300-monthly-subscription/
[4] https://x.ai/legal/faq
[5] https://x.ai

$chatgpt_content.value:
{"meta":null,"content":[{"type":"text","text":"[![OpenAI](https://help.openai.com/logo.png)](https://help.openai.com/)[Login](https://help.openai.com/auth/login)

# What is ChatGPT Plus?

Information about our paid subscription plan, Plus.

Updated: 4 days ago

ChatGPT Plus is a subscription plan that provides enhanced access to the ChatGPT web app for $20/month.

* * *

## Benefits of ChatGPT Plus

- **Priority access during high-traffic periods**: Fewer interruptions even when demand is high.

- **Access to higher GPT-5 limits**: Use OpenAI’s most advanced model, capable of understanding text, images, and audio.

- **Access to GPT-4o:** Continue using OpenAI’s previous flagship model.

- **Faster response speeds**: Enjoy quicker replies in conversations.

- **Expanded features**:

  - Voice conversations

  - Image generation

  - File uploads and analysis

  - Deep Research tools (where available)

  - Custom GPT creation and use

* * *

## Subscription Details

- **Price**: $20/month (billed monthly).

- **Platform**: ChatGPT Plus is available on [chat.openai.com](https://chat.openai.com/).

- **Not included**: API usage is separate and billed independently. See [API pricing](https://openai.com/pricing).


* * *

## **How do I sign up?**

1. Log into **ChatGPT**

2. Click on your profile icon -> **Upgrade Plan**

3. Select 'Get Plus'


* * *

## Usage Limits

To ensure a smooth experience for all users, Plus subscriptions may include usage limits such as message caps, especially during high demand. These limits may vary based on system conditions.

* * *

## Billing and Invoices

You can manage your subscription, view invoices, and cancel your plan by:

1. Log into [ChatGPT](https://chatgpt.com/)

2. Click on your profile icon -> **Settings**

3. Select **Subscription**


#### Canceling your subscription

If you would like to cancel your subscription, please refer to our article: [How do I cancel my subscription for ChatGPT Plus or ChatGPT Pro?](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/7232927-how-do-i-cancel-my-subscription-for-chatgpt-plus-or-chatgpt-pro)

#### Refunds

If you believe you were incorrectly charged or would like to request a refund, you can [request a refund.](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/7232895-how-do-i-request-a-refund-for-chatgpt-plus-or-chatgpt-pro)

#### VAT Exemption Requests

If you would like to request a VAT exemption request, please refer to our article: [How do I submit a VAT exemption request?](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/7232908-how-do-i-submit-a-vat-exemption-request)

#### Is there an annual plan available?

Currently, we do not support annual billing or the option to pay for multiple months in advance for ChatGPT Plus subscriptions.

* * *

## Is there a ChatGPT Pro version?

We have an additional subscription option, entitled [ChatGPT Pro](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/9793128-what-is-chatgpt-pro).

Pro is a higher-tier plan that may include additional features, higher usage limits, or expanded access to premium tools.

For additional information on ChatGPT Pro, please refer to our article: [What is ChatGPT Pro?](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/9793128-what-is-chatgpt-pro)

* * *

## **Data Privacy**

OpenAI may use conversations to improve model performance and safety. You can opt out of having your data used for training at any time. If you would like to do so, please refer to our help article here: [Data Controls FAQ](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/7730893-data-controls-faq)

For more information, see our [Privacy Policy](https://openai.com/privacy) and [Terms of Use](https://openai.com/terms).

## Related articles

- [Student discounts for ChatGPT Plus (US/Canada)\\
\\
Details about our ChatGPT Plus student discount program](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/10968654)
- [Windows App - Release Notes\\
\\
Release notes for the ChatGPT Windows app](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/10003026)
- [ChatGPT Free Tier FAQ](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/9275245)

## Was this article helpful?

Submit","annotations":null,"meta":null}],"structuredContent":null,"isError":false}
